summary: An ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1976, for the improvement of 18th Avenue South and 19th Avenue South, each from Hanford Street to Atlantic Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for all necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20381 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
